title: 20min leave buster keeps restarting on its own
body:
im trying to play my leavebuster games but it starts on its own and wont let me play my games cause it starts back from 20min.
currently in queue and i have been waiting for 53mins jus for the queue to finish so i can play 1 game. fix this bug riot

replies.body:
same thing happened to me, waited 1 hr before closing it
cant get rid of the ban now RIP
Same here, I've been currently sitting here watching Youtube for over 2-hours trying to get this Ban Que thing to finish and it keeps resetting...
